import innerjpg from '../assets/055A7430.jpeg';
import parifi from '../assets/parifi.png';
import xpet from '../assets/xpet.png';
import fs from '../assets/fs.png';
import wizzor from '../assets/wizzor.png';
import udyoga from '../assets/udyoga.png';
import velaikkaran from '../assets/velaikkaran.png';
import pennyprobid from '../assets/pennyprobid.png';
export const steps = [{
  label1: '𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗪𝗲𝗯 𝗔𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻',
  description1: `PWA is developing web applications to provide traditional web apps the look and feel of native apps. This app includes music player, e-commerce , calendar, chat etc . where produce a mobile application in React Native by data provided from website`,
  label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
  description2: `Developed end-to-end React Native mobile application with backing of frontend and backend developers
      Currently working on music player App kind of spotify with more number of songs uploaded, playlist ,favorite, category,recent,song notification etc..,which golds 10 different themes.
      Receive input from user with support of frontend and backend developers and create a user friendly mobile application by user inputs with dynamic build at each time
      Worked close with frontend and backend team to optimize Reactnative mobile application`,
  label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
  description3: `React Native,Redux Toolkit,CSS,React Native Paper,React Native Track Player`,
  imgPath: innerjpg
  // 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1537944434965-cf4679d1a598?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&h=250&q=60',
}, {
  label1: '𝗣𝗮𝗿𝗶𝗳𝐢',
  description1: `Parifi is Crypto Trade site with Ethereum Blockchain Decentralized ,Polygon platform for exchange,
       profitable farming using BEP-20 tokens , which holds entire concepts of block chain as trade,liquidity,
       swap,borrow,lending,deposit,withdraw,stake and governance . The site has its own token (MATIC)
       and include a two type of trades where regular Spot,Limit, and stop and other one is margin trade`,
  label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
  description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,
      management and analytics Where use can add and remove fund in liquidity pool for interest , 
      swap currencies , stake fund and get rewards To service trading operations, user can be borrower and 
      also lender where lender can provide fund by adding Matic inpool for some interest and borrower can use
       the fund for trade , swap and return fund with interest rate Worked close with Smart 
       contract team to optimize web3 concept ,smart contract
       and payment integration using metamask and mobile wallet connection with implement frontend`,
  label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
  description3: `React Js ,WEB3,Smart contract, HTML,CSS,Redux,Meta mask, Mobile Wallet`,
  imgPath: parifi
}, {
  label1: '𝗫𝗣𝗲𝘁 𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗲',
  description1: `Xpet Game is an NFT site . It's a kind of cryptokitties website using Blockchain web3 concept 
      where user can buy a pet initially and can sale or breed with some other pet and give a born to 
      new pet , where the new born pet can also sell or transfer as per user choice.`,
  label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
  description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,
      management and analytics
      Worked close with Smart contract team to optimize web3 concept ,smart contract and payment 
      integration using metamask and mobile wallet connection with implement frontend
      Handle this NFT site by coin integration where user make transaction through BNB`,
  label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
  description3: `React Js ,WEB3,Smart contract, HTML,CSS,Redux,Meta mask, Mobile Wallet`,
  imgPath: xpet
}, {
  label1: '𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗸𝗵𝗮𝗱𝗮',
  description1: `Gaming Akhada is a fantasy sports website like Dream11 where user can select player and create 
      a tournament with some bid amount to win , when players get high score they will get rewards as cash. 
      Where the site holds news and forums with comment section, chat with all users,players statistics
       etc..`,
  label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
  description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,management
       and analytics Worked close with design team to optimize usability and implement frontend
      Implemented websites, mobile view, and landing pages from concept through deployment`,
  label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
  description3: `React Js , HTML,CSS,Redux,Firebase,Socket`,
  imgPath: fs
}, {
  label1: '𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗸𝗵𝗮𝗱𝗮',
  description1: `Gaming Akhada is a fantasy sports website like Dream11 where user can select player and create 
      a tournament with some bid amount to win , when players get high score they will get rewards as cash. 
      Where the site holds news and forums with comment section, chat with all users,players statistics
       etc..`,
  label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
  description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,management
       and analytics Worked close with design team to optimize usability and implement frontend
      Implemented websites, mobile view, and landing pages from concept through deployment`,
  label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
  description3: `React Js , HTML,CSS,Redux,Firebase,Socket`,
  imgPath: fs
}, {
  label: 'Create an ad group',
  description: 'An ad group contains one or more ads which target a shared set of keywords.',
  imgPath: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1537996194471-e657df975ab4?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&h=250'
}, {
  label: 'Create an ad',
  description: `Try out different ad text to see what brings in the most customers,
                and learn how to enhance your ads using features like ad extensions.
                If you run into any problems with your ads, find out how to tell if
                they're running and how to resolve approval issues.`,
  imgPath: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512341689857-198e7e2f3ca8?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&h=250&q=60'
}];

sourcesContent:
import innerjpg from '../assets/055A7430.jpeg' 
import parifi from '../assets/parifi.png'
import xpet from '../assets/xpet.png'
import fs from '../assets/fs.png'
import wizzor from '../assets/wizzor.png'
import udyoga from '../assets/udyoga.png'
import velaikkaran from '../assets/velaikkaran.png'
import pennyprobid from '../assets/pennyprobid.png'
export const steps = [
    {
      label1: '𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗪𝗲𝗯 𝗔𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻',
      description1: `PWA is developing web applications to provide traditional web apps the look and feel of native apps. This app includes music player, e-commerce , calendar, chat etc . where produce a mobile application in React Native by data provided from website`,
      label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
      description2: `Developed end-to-end React Native mobile application with backing of frontend and backend developers
      Currently working on music player App kind of spotify with more number of songs uploaded, playlist ,favorite, category,recent,song notification etc..,which golds 10 different themes.
      Receive input from user with support of frontend and backend developers and create a user friendly mobile application by user inputs with dynamic build at each time
      Worked close with frontend and backend team to optimize Reactnative mobile application`,
      label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
      description3: `React Native,Redux Toolkit,CSS,React Native Paper,React Native Track Player`,
                imgPath:innerjpg
        // 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1537944434965-cf4679d1a598?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&h=250&q=60',
    },
    {
      label1: '𝗣𝗮𝗿𝗶𝗳𝐢',
      description1: 
      `Parifi is Crypto Trade site with Ethereum Blockchain Decentralized ,Polygon platform for exchange,
       profitable farming using BEP-20 tokens , which holds entire concepts of block chain as trade,liquidity,
       swap,borrow,lending,deposit,withdraw,stake and governance . The site has its own token (MATIC)
       and include a two type of trades where regular Spot,Limit, and stop and other one is margin trade`,
      label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
      description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,
      management and analytics Where use can add and remove fund in liquidity pool for interest , 
      swap currencies , stake fund and get rewards To service trading operations, user can be borrower and 
      also lender where lender can provide fund by adding Matic inpool for some interest and borrower can use
       the fund for trade , swap and return fund with interest rate Worked close with Smart 
       contract team to optimize web3 concept ,smart contract
       and payment integration using metamask and mobile wallet connection with implement frontend`,
      label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
      description3: `React Js ,WEB3,Smart contract, HTML,CSS,Redux,Meta mask, Mobile Wallet`,
                imgPath:parifi
    },
    {
      label1: '𝗫𝗣𝗲𝘁 𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗲',
      description1: 
      `Xpet Game is an NFT site . It's a kind of cryptokitties website using Blockchain web3 concept 
      where user can buy a pet initially and can sale or breed with some other pet and give a born to 
      new pet , where the new born pet can also sell or transfer as per user choice.`,
      label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
      description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,
      management and analytics
      Worked close with Smart contract team to optimize web3 concept ,smart contract and payment 
      integration using metamask and mobile wallet connection with implement frontend
      Handle this NFT site by coin integration where user make transaction through BNB`,
      label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
      description3: `React Js ,WEB3,Smart contract, HTML,CSS,Redux,Meta mask, Mobile Wallet`,
                imgPath:xpet
    },
    {
      label1: '𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗸𝗵𝗮𝗱𝗮',
      description1: 
      `Gaming Akhada is a fantasy sports website like Dream11 where user can select player and create 
      a tournament with some bid amount to win , when players get high score they will get rewards as cash. 
      Where the site holds news and forums with comment section, chat with all users,players statistics
       etc..`,
      label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
      description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,management
       and analytics Worked close with design team to optimize usability and implement frontend
      Implemented websites, mobile view, and landing pages from concept through deployment`,
      label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
      description3: `React Js , HTML,CSS,Redux,Firebase,Socket`,
                imgPath:fs
    },
    {
      label1: '𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗸𝗵𝗮𝗱𝗮',
      description1: 
      `Gaming Akhada is a fantasy sports website like Dream11 where user can select player and create 
      a tournament with some bid amount to win , when players get high score they will get rewards as cash. 
      Where the site holds news and forums with comment section, chat with all users,players statistics
       etc..`,
      label2: '𝗠𝘆 𝗥𝗼𝗹𝗲',
      description2: `Developed end-to-end React js website provide real-time delivery tracking,management
       and analytics Worked close with design team to optimize usability and implement frontend
      Implemented websites, mobile view, and landing pages from concept through deployment`,
      label3: '𝗧𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆 𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗱',
      description3: `React Js , HTML,CSS,Redux,Firebase,Socket`,
                imgPath:fs
    },
    {
      label: 'Create an ad group',
      description:
        'An ad group contains one or more ads which target a shared set of keywords.',
        imgPath:
        'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1537996194471-e657df975ab4?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&h=250',
    },
    {
      label: 'Create an ad',
      description: `Try out different ad text to see what brings in the most customers,
                and learn how to enhance your ads using features like ad extensions.
                If you run into any problems with your ads, find out how to tell if
                they're running and how to resolve approval issues.`,
      imgPath:
                'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512341689857-198e7e2f3ca8?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&h=250&q=60',          
    },
  ];
